itemLabel: Patrick Bowes-Lyon, 15th Earl of Strathmore and Kinghorne
itemDescription: British peer; elder brother of Queen Elizabeth The Queen Mother

wikipedia_page.main: Patrick Bowes-Lyon, 15th and 2nd Earl of Strathmore and Kinghorne,  (22 September 1884 – 25 May 1949) was a British nobleman and peer. He was an uncle of Elizabeth II of the United Kingdom.
